```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)
library(GGally)
```
```{r}
view(diamonds)
```

```{r}
names(diamonds)

dim(diamonds)

summary(diamonds)

head(diamonds)

tail(diamonds)
```

```{r}
skimr::skim(diamonds)
```
```{r}
ggpairs(diamonds)
```
```{r}
ggplot(diamonds, aes(carat, price, color=cut))+
  geom_jitter()
```
```{r}
ggplot(diamonds, aes(x = carat)) +
  geom_histogram()
```

```{r}
ggplot(diamonds, aes(clarity, price)) +
  geom_boxplot()
```
